title: One drink away
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Geoff Owen-Taylor, HSV7 and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: Looks closely at alcoholism within the community and the devastating effects it can have on the home and industry. The organizations set up to help alcoholics and their families are also discussed. Hosted by Dan Webb.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, Geoff Owen-Taylor, HSV7 and Victoria. Ministry of Education
